pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Typing stubs for characteristicThis is a PEP 561 type stub package for the `characteristic` package.It can be used by type-checking tools like mypy, PyCharm, pytype etc. to check codethat uses `characteristic`. The source for this package can be found athttps://github.com/python/typeshed/tree/master/stubs/characteristic. All fixes fortypes and metadata should be contributed there.*Note:* `types-characteristic` is unmaintained and won't be updated.See https://github.com/python/typeshed/blob/master/README.md for more details.This package was generated from typeshed commit `60507a08a20b19c74473c30089f77ff483136a08`.
